amendment.description: At the end of division B (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available by this division (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 14 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 99 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to reduce spending for each amount in Division B by 14 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 318 (Roll no. 375).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 318 (Roll no. 375).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Banks.
